name: DRx SpectraLite FaceWare Pro
about: What it is:An FDA-cleared LED device for the face that targets wrinkles and blemishes for visibly smoother, clearer skin in just three minutes..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Redness, and Acne and Blemishes.What Else You Need to Know:This LED device offers professional light therapy in the comfort of your home. Designed to conform to all contours of the face, the SpectraLite FaceWare Pro mask features 100 red LED lights to support the production of collagen and visibly reduce wrinkles, and 62 blue LED lights to target acne-causing bacteria and prevent future breakouts. Optimal results occur after a 10-week course of treatment..Clinical Results:In a daily-use clinical study:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Set Up.- Plug USB charging cord into port connector on device.- Plug USB charging cord into Universal USB Power Adapter (not included) and into outlet for charging (use only UL or other locally certified and compliant USB  power adapter).- Charge your device for 2-4 hours.- Place device in protective storage bag when note in use ..Instructions for Use.- After cleansing, place device over the face, securing strap around head.- Press and hold power button for two seconds to turn on device, select light setting (red, blue, or red and blue) .- Device will automatically turn off after completion of a 3-minute session.- Remove device and follow with the Alpha Beta Daily Peel (sold separately)..Troubleshooting.If the device is not turning on:.(1) Press and hold the on/off button for 2 seconds.(2) Check that the device is fully charged (Power Indicator Light is illuminated and solid)..If the device is not charging:.(1) Check that the USB charging cord is firmly inserted into device (Power Indicator Light is illuminated).(2) Try a different USB Power Adaptor to ensure it is working properly..If the device shuts off abruptly, prior to 3-minute session:.(1) Device is designed to shut off automatically after 3 minutes.(3) System may shut off after multiple, repeated uses. Allow device to rest for a minimum of 10 minutes and try again..If you are still having issues, please contact Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Client Care at +1-888-830-SKIN

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel, as someone who genuinely and desperately needed something to help with my acne, I'm obligated to write this.   first of all, this isn't going to magically banish blemishes overnight or make wrinkles disappear.   I am on a regimen of Tretinoin, spironolactone, and topical anti biotics.   Adding this mask has made a significant difference in a relatively short amount of time. I have been using this for about 3 weeks. it's helped reduce the healing time of breakouts and reduced the amount I get overall. if you read the studies, this device is BEST when used WITH a solid skincare routine and mostly when your skin is being exfoliated (i.e. tret/peels). I think this alone it's not going to be as affective but it has definitely boosted my results from my dermatologist Rx products.   further, you can get this with an FSA/HSA account.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, the strap isnu2019t great ( I pulled it out and added a ribbon) but who care when this device is so amazing?! I bought it a year ago and used the red light daily, but I put it on the red/blue settings and it took care of a red spot on my cheek that three professional laser treatments couldnu2019t budge. This mask is remarkable for anti aging.

reviews.review_title: Overall worth it for acne and rosacea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this years ago after being given a free blue light device to trial from another brand that massively helped my cystic acne and reading studies about the benefits of light therapy. That trial device only spot treated so it took me forever to treat all the areas that needed it. So after it died, I wanted to get something that would treat my whole face. I first got a light panel, but a treatment took like 30 minutes and you had to sit in one spot just staring at the light device the whole time while making sure not to get too far away from it, which was uncomfortable. You were also supposed to do treatments multiple times a day. It was a huge time suck and I didn't notice any effects. Plus it was huge and difficult to store. So I researched more and found this device which was newer on the market and had the right wavelengths for both treating acne and rosacea, which were my primary concerns. The red light wavelengths seemed to be the right ones too, so I was sold despite the high price since I figured I'd return it if it didn't work. It works really well for both my acne (including cystic acne) and rosacea!! I do need to use it daily to see the best results, but since the treatment time is so short that's easy to do. The strap to keep it on seriously sucks, but I see they've updated that so hopefully it's better now. I just use it while laying down. I also don't trust that it's safe to use with my eyes opened due to how bright it is so I just keep my eyes closed. I can't say how helpful the anti-aging benefits are though since people already thought I was much younger than I am. I will say it doesn't seem to be built the greatest as sometimes the button takes a few presses before it works and the construction seems cheap. Though it's still working, so I guess I can't complain too much. I do wish however that it fit my face a bit better. Overall, it's worth the high price for me since it provides such major benefits and relief.

reviews.review_title: Always use the charger it came with
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can tell a difference in my skin after using this for a year. i rotate between red light for pigment evening and blue light for acne. The only issue i will report is i tried using my C-port fast charger and regular another C-port charger and it will not charge the mask at all. You have to us the USB charger it came with. the customer service was friendly and helped me out. other than that it still works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do yourself a favor and invest in a different brand. This was my first experience with a red light therapy product and I am not a fan.   I bought this item in hopes that its blue light feature would be the answer for my adult acne, while also hopefully seeing some benefit from the red lights. First, the mask doesn't even come with a proper protective case...just a little drawstring bag. For the price, you can't even safely travel with this product. Even the dyson airwrap (another luxury tool) has a proper hardshell case. Second, the strap on this is laughable. It does not stay secure for me, and the mask itself has some weight to it. Because of its heaviness and nonsecure strap, it is always sliding down my face, meaning I have to lay down the whole time. Third, my derm told me that 3 minutes is not enough time to see real benefit and told me that 10 minutes is more ideal for any type of red light therapy. She is a doctor, I am not, so I am inclined to believe her. Because of me having to sit with it on for 3 cycles (9 minutes), the battery dies so quickly.   All of that to say, I am disappointed with the lack of attention to detail and wish I could return the product for a refund. I won't speak to the effectiveness because I have since upped my acne medication regimen and believe that this is the reason for any improvement in my skin (I now use this mask about 3x per week and have had it since April), but the lack of attention to detail for such a pricey product is enough for me.   Also, like some other reviews have mentioned, I am concerned about the effect of the lights on my eyes. To be safe, you should probably keep your eyes closed while wearing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are pros and cons to this. Letu2019s start with the cons because I think there are more of those. Cons: - Price for results is high. The results are minimal and the cost of this mask is high. Depending on what youu2019re targeting and the results that youu2019re hoping for, this is most likely not worth the investment. - Blue lights stopped working about 12 months later on my device.  - This is a massive waste of plastic and electrical pieces once you can no longer use it. They should introduce a recycling program for this or something. I feel terrible throwing it away now that itu2019s no longer workingu2026   Pros: - Easy to use at home - Comes with both red and blue light treatment in one unit - Looks coolu2026?  Overall, I found other light therapy options more effective than this one. For me, the blue light in this device was more effective at reducing acne and treating acne marks than the red light was at reducing wrinkles.  For about 5 months, I was using this 2 - 3 x week. During each treatment session, I did one red light round and one blue light round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Straps are not as difficult as everyone has been saying.  Everything works and charge lasts for days. The lights are incredibly bright. The first day I got a headache, so I make sure to keep my eyes closed for the 3 minute use. Eye protection is a necessity for this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to help with my large pores and dark spots, plus the added benefits for fine lines and wrinkles. I use it on the dual light setting. In just a week I am already seeing a difference. I have this pimple-like looking thing on my nose. The dermatologist has a fancy name for it. In any case, it is not something that can be popped. My dermatologist removed it but it came back in a month. Within a week of using this device it is nearly completely gone. I didn't even think this was possible. Overall, my pores are smaller and less apparent.   I typically use this at night and follow it with the DDG peptide product. Then in the AM, after washing my face, I use the gentle peel. It may be the combo of these products working for me. I am really impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For accuracy, I did not change anything in my routine and used the blue light feature everyday for two weeks.   The results speak for themselves! I have acne prone and sensitive skin. Using traditional acne treatments did more harm to my skin barrier than good.  This mask was a great alternative to traditional serums. The blue light anti bacterial so it targets blemishes and pores.  After two weeks you can definitely see a difference! If you have the funds, I highly recommend   TIP:  - do not wear skincare under this! The light will have a hard time penetrating through.  - Make sure you wear it snug to get optimal results. It doesnu2019t fit well around my nose which is why the redness did not improve as much as my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will turn 61 this year and have been using this mask for over a year. It has done wonders for my skin. I still have some faint lines on my forehead, but they are dramatically different than what they were when I first started using this product. I have no 11 lines, virtually no wrinkles around my eyes. Lines around my mouth are gone. I do still have faint marionette lines, but they are also receding. I have no issue with the strap. I just tighten it up about once a week. My friends are getting face lifts and are astonished that I do not need one. This is a marvelous beauty device. I must say that I've had covid several times and it has affected my skin by drying it out severely. If I had not been using this mask, I would have looked much older than I am. Most people assume I'm in my late 40's to early 50's. I highly recommend this device. I have also invested in the Body, Mouth, and Eye LED items as well. I'm reviewing the Faceware Pro because I've used it the longest. They all work, though. This will also work on your neck if you but the mouth section near your chin and let the rest of the device sit on your chest! Very effective. My review is my own and I've not been given an incentive. I highly recommend this product!

I use it once a day on clean skin, followed by the Dr. Gross alpha-beta skin peel and serum/cream. My skin looks and feels better than it has in a long time. Worth the investment!!.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has to be the most I've ever spent on a beauty product. BUT if I can spend in the region of this on botox annually, then I figured what's the harm in investing in something that could cut down on the bill and (hopefully) save money in the long run? It has 2 main functions, to combat acne/breakout prone skin and also aid in the anti-ageing process. I purchased it for the latter, and was curious to see if it improved my overall skin texture and elasticity.  The results? My skin definitely looks more radiant and uniform looking. I feel that it has done something to my fine lines too as they seem ever so slightly less visible. My skin looks and feels good and for the price you pay for this contraption, it definitely should! The only con I had with the mask was with the elastic strap that tightens it in place. After only 3 sessions, it started to lose its grip, meaning I had to hold the mask in place. I absolutely loved trying this mask, but I just cannot get my head around the price. After a months' usage, though I'm loving the other results, I'm not convinced it's the immediate answer to botox. The elevens' are still there, the crows feet still visible when I smile. Muscle movements, are something it doesn't seem to work on, which is confusing as the description mentions targeting wrinkles (which are caused by muscle movements!). Think of this more as an investment for your skin. In that respect, this hasn't disappointed!  ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. I contact Denis Grossu2019s customer service, didnu2019t get a reply.  I can only accept the fact that my money got wasted.    Both of the masks had something wrong with the battery, either wonu2019t charge or no matter how long I charge, it could only light up for 10 sec and shut itself down.  Iu2019d say donu2019t gamble $600 on this poorly made mask. There are quite a few reputable LED masks on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this so far. It's easy to use. I hope for nice results but it has only been a couple of weeks. My first mask had the wrong charging cord included in the box! When it ran out of power I couldn't charge it. I had to return it and purchase a new one. I opened the new one right in the store to make sure the power cord was the correct one. A weird issue to have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite splurges! It is a commitment and I have been religious about it for about it since the beginning of this year (2022) and can see and feel a difference with my acne. It does not fix existing hormonal acne but it does minimize the appearance and it does ent look so angry. It does not fit my face perfectly so I do a second treatment by holding the forehead area on my chin for the 3 minutes.  The instructions do say to wait 10 minutes in between uses so it does add time to my nightly skincare routine.  I do also notice a difference I. My overall skin texture, tone, and plumpness which is amazing and Iu2019m so happy I went ahead and tried it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The strap feels embarrassingly cheap for a tool of this price point.

reviews.review_title: I upgraded to a professional device
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using this for a few weeks but I noticed very quickly that it affected my eyes. Yes, the current thinking is that red light is safe for eyes and eye protection is not needed. That doesnu2019t mean the research will always say this and my eyes started to get dry and I noticed an impact on my peripheral vision. I stopped using this. I became a licensed esthetician and learned a lot more about light. Any light that is powerful enough to make an impact in 3 minutes might be so powerful that it might have some risks too. Something to consider. I upgraded to a pro device from another brand not sold at Sephora. Itu2019s also sold at a retail cost for about $1800, and I paid $1200 for it with a pro discount. It  runs for 30 minute cycles (less powerful lights are safer for longer periods) and it came with eye protection. Something to think about. If you use this mask, cover your eyes. Protect them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the results from this mask but after less than a year of use some of the lights have stopped working. At this price point we should expect more than one year of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this about four months ago and have used it pretty religiously (i do occasionally miss a night here and there). i wasn't expecting much, but i have definitely noticed improvement! even the Dr that does my botox has noticed overall improvement! my lines are less obvious and my overall tone is more even. my breakouts seem less angry and go away pretty fast. if you can afford it, get it (but still wait till the sale). also, the strap is trash and i just use it while i'm laying down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think this was helping me a bit but it stopped working a month after I received it. I wish I had listened to other reviews, itu2019s not worth the money.

reviews.review_title: Works for me, fav PM ritual
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works my skin looks so much better.  I only use the anti aging red light with exception if I have a break out Iu2019ll use the red w blue.I use it EVERY night except Friday bc thatu2019s the day I give myself a break from my skin rituals.  My skin texture is great now.  My injector noticed as well without telling her I was using this. Itu2019s like my dullness is gone I look brighter & happier.  Thankful for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has changed my skin. Every time after I use it my skin irritations are immediately calmed. I have been using for about 10 weeks now and have seem so much improvement in skin texture, redness, and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Stopped charging after less than a year. Would strongly advise against purchasing this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had for a couple years, but don't see any difference.

reviews.review_title: A must buy with A++ results!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve had my mask for a few years and i canu2019t live without it! The biggest improvement is that itu2019s really firmed up my jawline and the sagging in my jowls. Really surprised by the negative reviews, I donu2019t have any issues charging but the pamphlet says not to leave it on the charger so I only charge until itu2019s full. Since my mask is older I didnu2019t know how to clean it so I reached out to Dr gross customer service and they were so nice. This mask travels everywhere with me!

reviews.review_title: Great Results, Design Could be Better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thrilled with the results, I use the red/blue combo daily to help keep maskne at bay and slowly brighten and firm skin. Pictures are taken 2 weeks and then 6 weeks apart.  My acne quickly faded and I think itu2019s slowly helped soften lines around my eyes and even out my skin. It is annoying that the mask isnu2019t bigger since it doesnu2019t totally cover my forehead, itu2019s hard to pack, and the strap design is not the best so I donu2019t bother using it. If I only wanted the red light I would probably have chosen one of the other options as there are some FDA approved that are made with flexible material making them easier to pack, they sit closer to your skin, and the masks look bigger making them better for longer or wider faces. But, I wanted the combo lights and ultimately am happy with the results and will continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this mask for 3 years now and I like it I need to use it a lot more then I do, but other then that I really like it when I do use it. it has held up really nicely.

reviews.review_title: Worked Great, until it stopped charging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This worked really well on combating hormonal acne and decreasing minor signs of aging for a few months. I didn't use it regularly, just occasionally when minor blemishes would pop up. I charged it maybe 2-3x and now it will no longer charge or hold a charge and shuts off after about 3 seconds. Sephora will not take it back as it is outside of the 60 day return window and DDG will not respond to any of my inquiries. Read the other one star reviews and google this. It is a known issue that the company is not standing behind or addressing. This is a really disappointing way to say goodbye to $300+.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This masked worked absolute wonders on clearing up and tightening my skin. I noticed some negative reviews regarding mask fit but I don't believe it needs to be molded to your face in order for it to be effective - should just need to be close to your skin. I used the mask w the peel 3x a week and noticed a significant improvement in texture and breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesnu2019t fit at all! I read that it doesnu2019t work for full faces but Iu2019m very petite and it doesnu2019t fit my face either. The only place the mask makes contact with my face is on the bridge of my nose and it HURTS! If I lay down and press the mask to my face it makes a little more contact but then when I go to take it off the (silicone?) lining sticks and pulls up the skin under my eyes- big no! The strap also doesnu2019t stay tight and falls out so I canu2019t move around with the mask on anyway. The chin is way too low so I have to leave my mouth hanging open to get any light on my chin. I SO wanted this to work and even used my points (that canu2019t be refunded) to get a discount but, unfortunately, this is going right back. Such a disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my birthday in December. Itu2019s a great product, while it worksu2026 I had read some comments about it breaking but chose to ignore them. As of yesterday it turns off after about 10 seconds even after charging overnight. Luckily I think Iu2019m within sephoras 3 month warranty window and you can register the product directly on dr Dennis gross website (I think that warranty is for a year?) but for a $450 product that malfunctions/breaks so easily, the warranty window should be at LEAST 2 years, if not more. I liked the fact that this was FDA cleared and wireless and itu2019s done great things for my skin (so far..: I mean Iu2019ve only had it for like a month and a half, max) but Iu2019m not sure if ill invest in another in the future unless the warranty or quality of the product improves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Trust the reviews u2013 this mask is not great for large/wide faces. I have wide cheekbones (heart-shaped face) and can walk around with this mask on without using the strap because it grips my cheekbones so tightly. I don't have a particularly long face, and this mask does not cover any of my jawline area, thereby rendering it useless for hormonal acne in that area. I took another reviewer's suggestion and have been using the mask flipped to cover my jaw and neck.  I have been using this mask every day for a week (red light setting) and haven't seen a difference in my post-acne pigmentation. I previously used a much less expensive light mask from Amazon and honestly saw better results after a single 45-minute session with it than I have after the past week with this mask. I will continue to use this mask in the hope that it has better results with long-term use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This item is not suitable for all faces. It does not fit an Asian bone structure. If it touches the chin, it does not touch the forehead. Spoke to customer service and they are not allowing for returns even though I havenu2019t used it. Extremely disappointed and $400 down the drain.

reviews.review_title: Doesnu2019t help fine lines and wrinkles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this mask every single day for 14 weeks in an effort to help with some fine lines and wrinkles. I can honestly say that it hasnu2019t done anything. While my skin definitely feels softer, thatu2019s the extent of the improvements Iu2019ve seen. If youu2019re getting this mask for fine lines and wrinkles, save your money. I promise this is not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The policy of the Dr. Deniss Gross company: When purchased outside the United States, please contact your place of purchase for local warranty information. Mine stopped working after 66 days and Sephora wouldn't exchange it since the return policy is 60 days. I can't return it either. I even offered to buy another one if they offered me a discount code of 20% before the next BI sale and they said no! Think hard before buying this.

reviews.review_title: great for sensitive acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally found this amazing for my acne! I am so happy I have finally found something that I can use daily on my sensitive skin. you will most likely need to use this product daily, as I see and feel a difference when I skip a few days! but I would 100% recommend to anyone who has sensitive acne prone skin like me! love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never written a review before but I want to warn people not to buy this product. Iu2019m a loyal Dennis Gross customer and was so excited to buy this, but unfortunately it stopped working (would just shut off after a few seconds - and it would do this after being fully charged and resting for days so it wasnu2019t overheated). I reached out to Dennis Gross customer service for their u201climited warrantyu201d and they literally just copied and pasted the troubleshooting package insert (I had already tried all of these steps) and told me if that didnu2019t work to contact Sephora but they wouldnu2019t replace it for me. Thankfully Sephora was incredible and gave me a refund (best customer service ever!!) but buyer beware - you may be paying over $400 for a product that will only last a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Helped when it worked but Stopped charging shortly after purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have consistently used this pricey mask as directed for a month and had no improvement. I tried returning it after giving it 4 weeks and just missed the return window (I thought it was an extended holiday return window because this was purchased in early November, plus there was a shipping delay that ate into the 30 day window).  Any skincare routine requires at least 4 weeks for improvement and I am disappointed by the return policy as explained to me in store and online. I had modest expectations for this to work, understanding nothing works overnight but I  am over $500 poorer and my skin looks the same. Don't waste your money. I would rate this zero if that were an option as it those are the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this mask every night after I wash my face and while I brush my teeth. The 3 min timer is perfectly synced with my toothbrush and I fit this into my routine so easily. When shopping around for a LED face light I was drawn to the time frame ( 3 min), cordless, and the strap so I can move around and donu2019t have to lay down for use. All of these features have made it easier for me to incorporate the face mask into my daily routine, otherwise I do not think I would spend this money on a device that I would be less inclined to use on a daily basis. I know people have complained in here about the strap.. I personally have not had to many issues with it, I do need to tighten it maybe every few times I wear it, kind of like swim goggles but I donu2019t mind. There has been a couple times that it has come loose while I have been wearing it but I was able to fix it easily, and the mask grips my face so much on its own I donu2019t think it would ever fall to the floor. I have noticed that my strap does look different then other reviews that I have watched so I think that they have updated it to be better? I included a picture of what my strap looks like. I am happy with the charging capacity of my mask and all of the bulbs are still in mint condition after 6 months of daily use, I think I will get many more years out of this product. I think it is the perfect addition to my preventative aging skin care routine. :)

Please pay attention to poor reviews of this product. It stops working properly after about a month of consistent use. The technology behind this product is promising but this specific device is cheap and of low quality.

reviews.review_title: Not for people with bigger faces.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, i think I would have loved this. However, if you have a round or larger face this device is much to small.  The lights will not hit the sides of your face, definitely not size inclusive.   I wish that it was made a little bigger.

reviews.review_title: Buy if you have the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve owned this nearly a year now and thereu2019s no telling if itu2019s made a huge difference or not but I have noticed my skin is always zit-free now and my  redness has gone down. My husband mentioned too that he hasnu2019t heard me complain about my skin in a long time. I spoke with my dermatologist about this mask and he said itu2019s a great product but the in-office results are significantly better, which I donu2019t doubt. The lights and battery are still working great. I clean it with a Lysol wipe after every few uses. People hate the strap but I just immediately removed it and found it unnecessary. I use it before bed every night laying down. If you have the money then definitely try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this.  Unfortunately, this product did nothing for my face after using it for 2 months.  Was able t return it for a full refund.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mask for about 6 weeks and I am pleased with the results.  My skin is sensitive and I tend to get areas of sensitivity and an occasional breakout.  This mask is very effective in clearing up both types of issues.  I believe that it has also helped with the collagen level and fine lines.  I use the mask 3-4 times a week on all 3 settings and anytime I display sensitivity redness.  I like the 3 different cycles available and having red and blue lights has become a requirement for me in any future purchase I might make. I highly recommend the mask.  I hope that in the future they redesign the strap.  I have figured out how to make it work but it is slippery and hard to adjust it properly.  Donu2019t plan on walking around with the mask on and plan on reclining and staying still.  If you do all 3 cycles itu2019s only 9 minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin look healthy and happy from once daily use with red and purple light BUT Iu2019m ordering TANNING GOGGLES from Amazon because I get a headache at the back of my eyes from using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review is based on daily/sometimes twice daily use for five months.  Prior to COVID, one to two hormonal cystic acne bumps per months. Sometimes none. After COVID, 4-5 HUGE PAINFUL cystic acne bumps per WEEK.   I was MISERABLE.   I was just about to restart a prescription medicine from  my dermatologist that literally jacked up entire body the  previous time I had been on  it. I was desperate.  Then I was up doing some late night shopping and ordered this.  I dedicated myself  to using it every single day.   Within two weeks the bumps were no longer forming and the previous scars were healing more quickly than normal. I thought maybe just a coincidence, but of course kept at it .  I can now honestly say that after 5 months, I get maybe one bump a month...and itu2019s not nearly as severe as before and heals up much more quickly. Also my hyperpigmentation has lightened.  I never skip a day for fear.  Itu2019s a commitment not a quick fix. Iu2019m ok with that. 6 minutes of my day is easy and doable.  I do not use the straps. They are awful and Iu2019m afraid of my mask falling off and  breaking. So I just hold it on my face. Doesnu2019t bother me at all.  If you are suffering from acne TRY THIS.  I want to get a backup in case anything ever happens to mine. I charge it overnight every 3-4 days just to make sure itu2019s always ready.  Thatu2019s all! 1000000 stars if I could!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised to see some major wrinkles and dark spots on my forehead disappear. I used to get Botox every 6 months and now I donu2019t need it. Yes this is expensive but I believe itu2019s worth it. I use it twice a day and then follow with a serum. I also saw a YouTube video that Paris Hilton brings this when she travels!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this during the Sephora sale and had been eyeing it for a while after having my friends rave about it. I have been using it for about 2 weeks and noticed that it has helped with the speed of acne resolution and scarring. It's super easy to use and I love the automatic timer. I will need more time to see if does any anti-aging but my boyfriend says yes.  The only reason I will take away a star is that for an expensive beauty product, the strap to put it on your face is terrible. It's a silicone material and very slippery so really hard to keep the strap through the loops. If you make it too tight, it pulls on your hair when taking it off or unravels. It's also not easy to pull it through the loops when the mask in on your face. I wish they had done a different material or different mechanism for the strap. I think the easiest way to use it is to forgo the straps altogether and just rest on your face laying down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best on the market. Mask is convenient and functional. Three minutes and you are finished. I am happy with my purchase!

reviews.review_title: Great for your face and mood!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! My face completely cleared of a strange rash I had. 9 minutes a day to use all 3 lights is so nice compared to the other masks out there that take 20 minutes each. I can also wear my glasses over top!

reviews.review_title: Brilliant tool to get rid of acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no acne on my face now. Have been using for almost half year. Use every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it consistently and canu2019t say I noticed much of a difference. Burned out once it was outside of warranty and wonu2019t charge anymore. $435 for a piece of junk. Frustrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You may have to charge it for few hours every other day ! :(  I had it for 4 months and apparently I am not covered by any warranty policies, be aware

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are thinking about it, just buy it. It works amazing. I was nervous to buy because of the price but honestly it really does work and is totally worth it! I suffer from hormonal cystic acne and nothing really worked to get rid of it because these breakouts occur deep under the skin. This is the first thing that helped prevent my cystic acne. It also works great at helping with dark spots from all the acne I had. This isn't a short term fix, this mask plays the long game. You definitely need to use it consistently everyday to see results. But it is easy to incorporate it into your routine because it has a strap and you can move around with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, Iu2019m in my mid 30u2019s. I still get acne, mostly hormonal, and I do get brown spots sometimes from the sun or from acne scars. Sometimes I get an IPL that zaps them away but that can get pretty costly and doesnu2019t do anything about acne. For the price of two IPL sessions, I just bought this. It does take a couple weeks to fade away acne scars/brown spots. And while it helps clear up acne, it can take a few days along with topical treatments. So donu2019t expect miracles overnight. This doesnu2019t really sit on my face right either. If itu2019s touching my forehead, it really isnu2019t touching my chin right etc. but that isnu2019t a deal breaker for me. As for wrinkles, I donu2019t have fine lines...yet! I will most likely get deeper lines on my face as a age, and this device will not help with those. This was designed mostly for fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not only did this not work for my breakouts but it in fact made it worse. I broke out more than ever in the 2 months of using it religiously everyday. I stopped using and used benzoyl peroxide 10% for last 2 days and in just 2 days my skin has improved remarkably. Just $7 bucks spent vs $380 on the spectra lite (bought on rouge sale).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased it on Black Friday, and I was really excited to try it. It turned out to be my biggest regret! It worsen my facial skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have MASKNE or perioral dermatitis or just want younger smooth skin THIS IS IT! Omg it was worth every penny , I had a mask shape pimple fest on my face for 6 months , I tried everything. Then I found some research that suggested LED as a treatment. It cleared my face up 50% in one week , 100% in 2! Iu2019ve also had THREE people ask where I get u201cmy worku201d done lol so Iu2019m taking that as a compliment because I donu2019t do any procedures . Just good skincare routine and this light everyday. Only downside is the face strap, it does not work at all. For this price I wish they would fix it , but it really is the only negative. I would totally purchase again . Definitely make sure to register the product on dr Dennis gross for your warranty. I saw people complaining it broke but if you register your product itu2019s not an issue. Love this face mask Iu2019m so happy I donu2019t have acne or troubled skin anymore! Iu2019m almost 38, and this has turned back the clock for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You know those stretch lines you get on your chest when your girls start to droop? I have 36F's. GONE after a couple months of use (along with a decent serum regiment afterwards).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received two defective/broken products in a row; 1st one didn't work on the third setting - made a static noise and turned off; 2nd one arrived damaged and doesn't look like the picture - the strap is different and the mask shape is also different on the second mask- if it touches your forehead it won't touch your chin and vice versa

reviews.review_title: DO. NOT. BUY. Breaks easily;Sephora wonu2019t replace
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DO. NOT. BUY. I read the reviews about it breaking and thought that it would be okay for me to try, but Iu2019ve had it for all of TWO WEEKS and itu2019s dead. The other reviews Iu2019ve read said that after three months Sephora wonu2019t replace it so Iu2019m not going to bother buying another. Dr. Dennis Gross people, FIX THE CHARGING PORT. Because when it was working I was getting amazing results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They changed the strap from a previous version, but itu2019s still terrible and doesnu2019t hold. How have they not done any R&D on this?! For such an expensive product (where a key value is its mobility) the strap is absolutely useless

reviews.review_title: GOT 2 DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS IN A ROW
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received it in the mail, tried to charge it but it wouldnu2019t charge, so I had to search for a Sephora location that had it in stock to exchange it. I came home excited to try it, only to find out that this one is defective too. Iu2019ve already wasted time in traffic, as I live in L.A. and had to schedule everything that day around my trip to Sephora to exchange it. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't write a real 'review' yet - as I just received the shipment today.  BUT I wanted to share the packaging details.  I thought it would be useful to others to share what it looks like upon arrival.    It appears the strap support has been remade/revised/recreated and looks stronger, better and more supportive than the previous version.  After some months of use I plan on coming back to leave a better review on the actual product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy using this mask. My mom and I share it and make it a little night time tradition. I do feel like it has improved wrinkles and breakouts. It is super easy and quick to use compared to other LED masks I have seen on the market. I would recommend to people if they are willing to splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask, I saw significant improvement with my stubborn under-the-skin acne after 2 weeks of daily use. I noticed that on my face the mask doesnu2019t go all the way down to my jawline so I have to reposition it and do two sessions, but itu2019s still a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mask. Makes my skin glow, make it bright and plumps up my skin to visibly reduce wrinkles. After I started using this mask people have been commenting on my skin. I highly recommend this!  Wish I didn't wait so long to purchase it. I use it 2x a day for 3 min each useage. Sometimes I will use it for 12-15 min once a week. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVED this product until it stopped holding charge just 5 months after purchase. Sephora told me the warranty is only valid for 3 months. I would recommend buying elsewhere with a longer warranty. Sephora usually has such great customer service - I was disappointed they were unwilling to help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was great until it quit charging after the second time charging. I was past the return period wit Sephora so I reached out to Dr. Dennis Gross the company who told me to email them. Iu2019ve never even received a reply. To pay that much was a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mask surpassed my expectations. Been using it everyday for about 3 weeks now (once in the morning, and once at night). I had previously tried all sorts of acne products (including the Alpha Beta peels, Eradikate, etc) to no avail. I had also tried professional salon peels (Green Peel), but they were too harsh on my skin.   This mask has done it for me. It has reduced redness and significantly helped with breakouts (rosacea breakouts). Expensive, but so worth it.  If you do get it, make sure to register it on the Dr. Dennis website for the extended 1 year warranty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was OK but I didn't notice a significant difference in my acne or my fine lines. I did it ~6 days a week for about 2 months. It's possible I needed to stick with it a little longer, but I just couldn't justify the price. Returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this spectralite!  it fit's good to my face and it's really comfortable.

reviews.review_title: Pricy but worth it if you have the $
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mask! Very expensive but it definitely works as described. I struggle with fine lines and cystic acne and using this device 3 times a week has really decreased the amount of breakouts I experience, erased small wrinkles from my face, and has generally improved the texture of my skin. After I use this mask and even before I apply my serums and moisturizer, my skin feels plump and brand new compared to how dry it usually feels.

reviews.review_title: Faulty product not made to last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought October 2019. Stopped charging July 2020. Worth $435?! I donu2019t think so!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Completely agree with reviewers who commented on size. I have a wide face and it was not covering sides of my face and even Chin. I think itu2019s a serious manufacturing defect given such a high price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would give it 0 star for the size. It's not gonna fit if you have a round face!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since it only takes 3 minutes, I use the red+blue light every day. I noticed a difference in the redness and overall texture of my skin, but the biggest difference has been the small lines and overall tone.  My skin is much more even and toned. That thing fights gravity and aging in the best way.   As most people have said though, the straps are annoying, so when I use the device I just lay back for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for three weeks I noticed my acne was less noticeable, but I did not notice any difference in my scarring or redness. In fact, my redness increased due to the exposure of lighting. If you have the money and want to diminish mild acne, this is okay. For rosacea, donu2019t even bother. This is more for aesthetic purposes rather than performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mask every night for about 3 weeks. It has absolutely cleared my acne and made any scarring i had fade significantly! I can't tell if it is helping my wrinkles/fine lines as it probably needs more time to deliver significant results in that area. But honestly I have high hopes after how quickly it has cleared my skin. It is also a beautiful design and very easy to travel with the little bag it comes with. I am in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The thing received is very exquisite, but size is small ,occupied

reviews.review_title: Broke after two months of use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was religiously using my mask every day and it stopped working this week. It used to stop after the 3 minute treatment but stayed on for hours until the charge went out. Then it would only turn on when on the charger. I purchased it two months ago. Thankfully Sephora has extended their return policy so I was able to get a full refund. Buyer beware! Be sure to activate the warranty within the first 30 days of purchase. If you dont do that, Dr. Gross will not take the mask back with the year warranty.

reviews.review_title: if you have a wider face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't buy it if you have wide cheek bones because this will squish your face.  This device is made for people with small face.  This device doesn't cover jawline areas and side of your face.  I have to light this up twice and use it separately for the top half and bottom half of my face to get full coverage (with neck area). After I bought this I saw a few other brands that cost less and have more coverage around face area and neck which also suitable for people with wider cheekbones. The strap is flimsy, it's better to use this lying down because if you use the strap stand up (or if your cheek bone can hold on to the device) the device will drag down on your skin. For the price this is not worth it. Could have used more material lights and wider mask.  Going to replace with another brand when this eventually dies. I've used another product from DR DG, and it was not impressive. I don't think I'll ever purchase from him again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has improved my skin with hormonal breakouts, firmness, lines and wrinkles.  Easy to use and made well.  The straps are fine, Iu2019m not super picky.  I love using this!  Iu2019m 52 and my skin is dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every day for 3 minutes and have definitely seen results. There are some flaws: no indicator to tell you when you need to charge it. It just stops.  The straps are ridiculous. After the first use I gave up on them and I just hold the mask. The most serious flaw is that the mask tapers to a narrow point over your chin. The treatment misses the lower cheeks and jawline. For this price they should have added a little more plastic and a few more LED bulbs. Since I bought this I've noticed other similar masks that offer more coverage of the lower cheeks and jawline. When this one eventually dies, I'll be replacing it with another brand, unless Dr. Gross improves the design.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mask because Iu2019ve been dealing with hormonal acne for a long time now. Two years ago, I was on accutane for 9 months to deal with my cystic acne. Since then, my skin had become oily again and I had started developing cysts.  I didnu2019t want to go straight back to the dermatologist because accutane is extremely tough on the body and I was willing to try anything else.  I bought this with fairly low expectations, but i actually see results! I use the mixed setting that had both the blue and red lights to tackle acne and anti-aging. I see my fine lines are reduced and my acne is really under control. If I have a zit, pretty much the next day after using this mask itu2019s gone.  The only negative is that it may not cover your face fully. It also worries me regarding lack of eye protection, but I use tanning goggles when I wear the mask.  Overall, I would recommend to give it a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had LED facials in a salon and also have had previous devices that work better than this one. The on button is fidgety. The results are minor compared to what they should be. With the red light you should see texture changes right away, not so with this device. It's been a month and I'm not seeing much change. Also, I'm 49 so I definitely would notice. On top of all that you can't register this product on their website

reviews.review_title: Seems to be having a negative impact on my vision
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really sad to be returning this product, as I had super high hopes for it. After about a week of using it every morning, Iu2019m noticing issues with my vision. I wear glasses, and Iu2019ve never had any problems with seeing far away with them on. The day before last, I noticed issues seeing farther objects after using the mask, which that lasted about an hour but went away relatively quickly. Yesterday, this happened again after using it, but lasted half the day. I figured the mask was likely the culprit, and Iu2019m afraid to keep using it now. This morning my vision is fine, no difficulties seeing with my glasses on. I donu2019t know if itu2019s how the mask fits my face (the eye holes are a little bit too high, but I always have made sure my eyes arenu2019t being covered by the part of the mask with lights, not sure if I just didnu2019t do a good enough job). Any who, too freaked out for my eyesight to keep using this, and pretty bummed about it.

reviews.review_title: Not Worth It If You're Already Doing Botox!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited when I purchased this during the spring sale and was immediately disappointed with Dr. Dennis Gross' customer service. A couple of days after I received my mask, I took it to my surgeon to see if it was safe to use while doing botox treatments. He informed me that I should do more research on it to see if the effects of the LED mask wouldn't counteract the effects of the botox treatments. So I went ahead and searched online for any additional information and didn't have any luck. The next thing I did was contact the manufacturer by sending a message through their chat, along with an email. It has been over a week since I contacted Dr. Dennis Gross, and all I've received is coupons and spam emails. Due to their lack of diligence, along with the other reviews I've read on Sephora, I decided to return the mask. It's not worth it to jeopardize the effectiveness of my botox treatments if that alone is already working out for me, and if I don't suffer from acne.

reviews.review_title: this is my number Mask so far.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this mask for almost a month now and so far it has worked pretty good for me, I have noticed a reduction in acne and as well in skin spots. I'm starting to feel comfortable in my own skin without make-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this product during the spring sale and was unable to even try it on because it is made for a more narrow profile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does work, but mine is not charging anymore and Iu2019ve only had it for four weeks.  I will be returning it pronto!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t waste your money - it didnu2019t do anything on my skin and even made my pigmentation worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great concept, easy to use but stopped working after 6 weeks.  Tinkered with it, tried different methods for charging and it will not charge.  Reached out to manufacturer for help and no response after two weeks.  Returning and will search for a better option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic find as I am someone who suffers from sebaceous hyperplasia. It helps with reducing redness and oil production and overall has improved the texture of my skin. Only downside so far is the charging port fits the charger a little to tight which I fear may cause an issue charging down the line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for over 6months for nearly everyday, and I donu2019t see any difference.  I donu2019t have acne, but have little break outs time to time when it close to my periods.  When I started use this, I started have some break outs all of sudden, so I stopped using this for a while. Once break outs got better, I restarted using this since I paid over 400$ to buy this and I donu2019t wanna throw this one out just because I had some break outs. Luckily no break outs but I donu2019t see any difference either.  I just keep using it hoping to have an anti wrinkle effect for the future...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking at this for a year with skepticism. The one my esthetician uses has worked miracles and I was worried this was a knock off version.  With quarantine, I obviously can't get facials but my cystic acne that has been GONE went off without this regular treatment, so I bought it out of desperation. I am so dang impressed. I've used it am and pm each day and within 4 days the difference with my cystic was insane. I so wish I had taken before and afters because I'm so mad at myself for waiting so long to make this purchase. The price tag is a gut punch but, honestly, with the missed facials and nails during pandemic, I've easily paid for it. I will get less regular facials now, which will also make up the cost.  I had zero issues with the straps (but honestly, if you can't lay down for 3 min to do this, that is your skin problem right there.) The fit is incredibly comfortable. It's sturdy and totally matches the price. Can't say enough good things, HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was very skeptical about this mask. You must use it daily and you will see results. have noticed such a huge difference in my skin and itu2019s texture. Fine lines reduced. If you have acne this will change your life but you must remember to use it everyday. Consistency is huge with a device like this. My only reason for not giving five stars is the mask is stiff and itu2019s one size fits all. It is too small for my face. I wish it either came in different sizes or had some flexible components the edge of this mask as it digs and indents the sides of my face and cheek area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to use and I really like it so far! Iu2019ve only had it for about a month, but it seems like itu2019s helping with fine lines around my mouth and reducing redness on my face.  The only negative is at first I thought the light was irritating my skin and I emailed Dr Dennis Gross skincare for advice and was curious if this was a common side effect, but they never responded.

reviews.review_title: a definite u201cu2018mustu201d for skincare fanatics
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly obsessed with this product! I use it in between step 1 & 2 of the alpha beta peel and itu2019s been transformational for my skin!  Disclaimer: I got off birth control 3 months ago after using it for 10+ years and my acne has been out of control because my hormone imbalance. I know serums and products like this can only help so much and even though my ance has not full subsided itu2019s definitely improved! See photos below!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t buy this at Sephora but another retailer, but hey , same thing. The laser on this is really weak and I didnu2019t notice any change after 3 weeks. Iu2019m going to keep trying it for another week or two to see if thereu2019s any mild difference in the before/after pictures. So far, nothing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very hesitant to purchase such an expensive gadget, but after having found much success in my regular LED facials at the spa, I decided to take the risk.    This mask initially worked great - the redness reduction definitely delivered and I noticed less breakouts as well.  No difference on fine lines, but being someone who suffers with bouts of red skin during the winter, this was a great at home fix.    Until it stopped charging and also stopped staying on for the full 3 min.  At first you just pushed the button again and it would restart and finish the full cycle, but eventually, it stopped staying on for more than 10 seconds.  Then, it stopped charging all together and is now dead.  The worst part is that the problems started after the Sephora return window and the worst of the issues started after the 90 day warranty ended.  I tried reaching out to the company before the 90 days was up and never heard back.  Sephora's customer service was also equally unhelpful and refused to exchange or refund something that was obviously defective.    I would not recommend this product under any circumstances as it has become a $500 toy for my niece.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used for 2 days and already see a difference. Definitely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought long and hard about purchasing this mask but I donu2019t regret it. I suffer hormonal acne and I canu2019t get any medication to work by itself. This has been a great help specially for the scars. It takes time to see the result( <+4 weeks) but itu2019s has change my life. It neutralizes pimples as soon as they appear and I can get rid of them in less than week. Before it will take more than a week and it will leave a horrible scar. I use the red and blue light in the morning and the blue itself at night to get the most of it. Itu2019s travel friendly and the battery last a week with 2 daily uses. The straps in the back donu2019t hold the mask too tight but I just lay down for 3 minute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good! My husband and I have been using this product for about a month. Iu2019m 8 months pregnant and have been having hormonal skin issues during this pregnancy . While my skin has improved- Iu2019m a tough gage since my skin isnu2019t behaving how it normally would anyway. My husband however has much clearer/brighter/ more rested skin since using this! He uses this mask every night before bed and it definitely shows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a 40 yr old Asian who used to have fair skin and suddenly turned dark and yellow. Whatever expensive serums and skincare didnu2019t work. Sleep and change of diet didnu2019t work. I was pregnant as well and gave this a try. I started to see change on 7th week. The red blotches below my nose went away from years ago by zit squeezing. The old acne brown scars went away and my skin became fair again. Also, my combination skin isnu2019t oily anymore. My big sun spot is only 20% lighter but already did a lot for me. Recommended it to my aunt, uncle and mom. Theyu2019re all happy about it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is overly hyped. I have been using it for a few weeks and dont see a difference. I find its made my skin more uneven and blotchy.  The alpha/beta peels are  a lot better I think!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Waste of money. Alpha beta peel is all that is needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffered from cystic acne during and after (long after) pregnancy and spent a lot of money on products, facials, and dr appts that did not deliver results. I then bought this mask and it exceeded all expectations! Iu2019ve had this almost a year and absolutely swear by it! Iu2019ve been able to use it this pregnancy (ask your doc) and have not suffered. I love that it targets lines as well (toddlers will accelerate the aging process!). The only thing that could improve is the strap - it will not stay put. You will not regret this purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this mask for almost a year, and have seen no real results. I am primarily using the red light setting, and bought this specifically to help with redness and pigmentation. The first 8 months, I used this nearly every day - even taking it with me out of town. I didnu2019t feel that I was seeing any difference, but that was confirmed when I stopped using it and saw no change. Perhaps itu2019s helping to prevent wrinkles (it hasnu2019t done much to any pre-existing ones, but I donu2019t have many yet). Iu2019d like to keep using it because of how expensive it was, but itu2019s such a big time suck for such lackluster results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am reviewing this product specifically for the blue light feature which is suppose to destroy the bacteria that causes (some) acne. I spent the $400+ only after using another product that was effective, but small and took too long to use regularly (particularly during hectic mornings). The blue light feature on this product was not only ineffective, but made my skin produce a ton of oil beginning about 1 hour after use. More breakouts, more stress...and Iu2019m out the $400. While I believe in blue light therapy, this product was a huge waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: They must have replaced the strap with a more sturdy one because mine holds the mask on perfectly. I have been using the mask for about 3 or 4 days and my pores already look smaller. Itu2019s so easy and only 3 minutes makes it so easy to use and fit into your daily routine. Highly recommend

reviews.review_title: I didn't sign up for aging, can I opt out?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I think I can opt out with use of this device.  I've been using it daily for a 6 weeks now and I'm seeing results.  My skin is a bit tighter and a bit less oily.  I don't have the type of acne that the device treats but use the combination setting regardless as I workout everyday.  I travel frequently and don't take the device with me.  I do notice the difference once I start using the device again.  Forget the straps, they just don't hold or work well. To deal with this, I just lie down for the 3 minutes...think of it as my time to mediate and just chill.  Even though I close my eyes when using, sometimes my eyes feel affected by the light (or maybe it's my mediation)...either way, I need to make a point of getting tanning bed eye covers to protect my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend got me this as a gift. Iu2019ve been using it religiously morning & night on all 3 settings and I already see improvement after a few weeks. I have some acne but mostly scarring I want to get rid of and I canu2019t believe how quickly this is working. As noted in other reviews I think being consistent using it is important.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually get 1 or 2 hormonal zits every month. Since I diligently use this mask everyday, I havenu2019t had one anymore! When I feel one is coming out, I use the blue light, the zit is gone within 2-3 days. I most times use red-only. I use red-blue when I feel a zit is coming up. Iu2019m not sure about the anti-aging red light one, since I donu2019t have wrinkles yet. Iu2019m glad I splurged and bought this instead of the Skin Inc one. With this, I just put it on my face, lie down on my bed and close my eyes, and done within 3 minutes. Very minimal commitment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 100% worth the money. I LOVE THIS MASK. I've had this for over a year and I am amazed at how much it has done for my skin. I use it on my neck, backs of my arms, my knees, literally anywhere this mask covers I'll put it. I need a full body treatment. If you're serious about changing your skin and everything else is falling short I swear to everything holy this will blow you mind. I promise you, no topical products you own will ever compare. Do yourself a favor and make the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for four days and I definitely see an improvement. My skin is smoother and my acne scars have lightened, which says a lot because I have naturally tan skin with hyper-pigmentation. When I started using this mask, I had two cystic volcanos, one on my nose and one near my eyebrow. Both since healed and normally it takes a full week or more for both the zit and dark spot to fade from my skin. I used both the blue light and red light in unison. I was initially very skeptical. It sounded too good to be true. I always thought my acne was from stress or birth control hormones. I've bought the PMD, Clarisonic, acid peels, Retin-A, facial essences promising to get rid of acne, and I use foundation with Vitamin C and turmeric and those all have helped to some degree but they can be harsh on the skin. So far this has been the most effective tool delivering the fastest results which leads me to believe that bacteria must be my main issue since the blue light that kills acne-causing bacteria seems to be working. I do have a bad habit of touching my face a lot throughout the day and I have oily skin that probably traps the bacteria. One thing I'm curious about is whether this is safe for my eyes. It's probably safe if its FDA-approved but I might try to find some tanning bed goggles on Amazon anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yup... this is a budget buster :) but it has been on my wish list since it came out and I finally took the plunge!  I love it!  I bought a very flimsy LED mask a while ago because I thought this was way too crazy expensive but the straps never fit and after using it for a few weeks I didn't see any changes. I bought this mask 3 weeks ago and can already see that my skin looks clearer!  I have almost 60 year old, oily/combination skin with huge pores, slight crow's feet and a few spots of discoloration.  I didn't realize how dull my skin was until I started using this mask. I love it and at 3 minutes a day it definitely fits my regime.  The mask is beautifully made and I love that there are both blue and red lights (I use both).  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The reasons I like this is that: (a)it has both blue led (kills acne causing bacteria) and can penetrate deeply even helping with my cystic hormonal breakouts on chin and jawline (b) and red LED which is anti aging and also helps with inflammation and healing (I did notice my breakouts healing faster) (c)only 3 minutes of use, so low time commitment which increases the likelihood of you sticking with it (d)great fit (e) no need to buy extra batteries   This isn't as strong as an in office treatment of course, but you can do it everyday and if you breakdown the value it is a lot cheaper.   This mask is also cheaper than the ones from other reputable retailers like Shani Darden ($1,900) and LG ($589). I for sure won't put an alibaba mask that costs 30 on my face that is not backed up by the FDA or a doctor.   The only thing I did not like was the strap. It is absolutely pointless and cheap. I lay down to do it and find it very relaxing, so I would not mind even if it didn't came with a strap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mask 2 weeks ago, and i am starting to see some difference in the texture of my skin, not much change on fine lines or dark spots yet. I am using it in combination with the peeling and dark spot serum . I am hoping for more good changes! So far so good

reviews.review_title: do not want to live without
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own three of them. No one believes my age. It's one of the steps in my skin care routine and it works. I have one at home, one for travel and another one in case one of those breaks - which hasn't happened yet.

reviews.review_title: Worth the money if you use it consistently
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Worth it. I used it for about a month and the line on my forehead disappeared. It was a fine line, the kind where I was just starting to notice it and took care of it before it became a thing. But it disappeared. Iu2019ve had it for a good 4 months now. When Iu2019m consistent with it, my smile lines start to fade. But then I stop and they come back. I just need to stick with it. If you know you will, I 100% recommend this. Just be careful, I used it twice a day for a week and I noticed dryness. So I went back to once daily and Iu2019m good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mask a lot, as a complement of my skincare routine. I usually use it 3 times a week! Sometimes i  prefer my Quasar MD because It feels like the lights penetrate deeper than this. The problem is that with the Quasar I spend more time than with my Dr. Dennis (only 3 minutes vs 18 min at least). The blue light is very effective! reviews.review_title: You either believe in LED skincare or not
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am 46 years old and a skincare junkie of about 20 years.  When it comes to spending $450 on a LED light mask for your face, I suggest you already be on board and have an understanding of LED benefits to your skin (ie what different light colors are designed to do, their depths they go versus laser treatments you might get at an actual dermatologist office, etc). There are a lot of LED options out there.  Over the years, what is really different as these have caught on with the general public is the amount of surface area of the skin on your face these at home treatment tools cover and the length of time needed to use them on a daily basis. My first hand held tool was about the size of dime and took me out 20 minutes to administer (because again, the surface area of the tool was small).    I have used a few different LED hand held tools over the years to get a larger surface area and thus cut down time.  I am only really interested in the red light due to my age.  I was excited about this Spectralife because the amount of surface area is no longer an issue with this mask, because it administers light to my entire face in 3 minutes.  With hand tools, my arm gets tired, because you are pressing the mechanism into your skin and moving it around.  With Spectralite, I make sure it is charged, have a clean face with nothing on it (I use it after my Refa tool and before essence), I put it on my face, press the button, lay down and chill for 3 minutes and I am done.  So maximum surface area is covered and it requires no work on my end.  Love it!   I use a mild alcohol wipe to clean it off once a week and store it in its pouch.  I use it once a day.  I have had it for about 30 days and have only charged it once, so it lasts a long time, maybe less if you are using it twice a day.   Is it working?  One never knows what is working if you have fine tuned a research driven skincare routine.  But I am a believer of LED light and I find this an excellent and super easy tool
